column1: Annael was a Sindar in the First Age.
Annael fought in the Nirnaeth Arnoediad
column2: and became the foster-father of Tuor during his early years in Mithrim.  In order to seek refuge from the Easterlings
column3: Annael lead a small group to the caves of Androth. When Tuor was sixteen years of age
column4: Annael resolved to lead his band to the south.  However
column5: when they made the attempt a great force of Orcs and Easterlings (First Age) scattered Annaels people.  Later
column6: he escaped Dor-lómin and joined Círdan
